title: JetBrains Academy – November Digest
description: As the year draws to a close, the JetBrains Academy team has some exciting updates for you! In this newsletter, you’ll discover new courses, plugins to enhance your learning, tech career tips, and updates for computer science educators.
author: Maria Sharobaeva
excerpt: Get ready for our latest updates: new AI courses, essential plugins, career-building tips, and resources for computer science educators.
text: The place for learning and teaching computer science your way Digest JetBrains AcademyJetBrains Academy – November Digest As the year draws to a close, the JetBrains Academy team has some exciting updates for you! In this newsletter, you’ll discover new courses, plugins to enhance your learning, tech career tips, and updates for computer science educators. Master AI With Courses NEW AI course Try the new Master AI: Build Game Players Using AlphaZero course. This course gives you the tools and resources to build AI from scratch, emulating DeepMind’s AlphaZero. Work hands-on with GPU-powered cloud environments to create AI game players and design your own web interface. Try now DevOps Engineer with AI Gain a comprehensive understanding of DevOps principles, CI/CD, configuration management, and the integration of AI technologies in DevOps processes. Learn up-to-date practical skills needed for a DevOps engineer role. Start learning New in November See what new content has been added to JetBrains Academy in November, including new Kotlin projects, AI tools, and more. Explore now Plugins for Effective Learning IDE Features Trainer Discover essential IDE shortcuts and features with the IDE Features Trainer plugin! Learn interactively right inside your IDE – no manuals or video tutorials needed. Download now Write flawlessly with Grazie Spot and correct grammar, spelling, and style issues instantly with the Grazie plugin. Get quick-fixes and explanations for your text – whether in comments, commits, messages, or code. Install now Career in Tech Five soft skills to include in your resume In an increasingly AI-driven world, soft skills are invaluable! Discover the top five skills to develop for a successful career in tech. Read now JetBrains Academy for Course Creators Teaching IT simplified Are you an independent course creator or a university professor? We’ve gathered all the useful resources for project-based course creation in one place. Learn more Subscribe to JetBrains Academy news IT courses, career insights, upcoming events and more Discover more
html:
The place for learning and teaching computer science your way

Digest JetBrains Academy

JetBrains Academy – November Digest

As the year draws to a close, the JetBrains Academy team has some exciting updates for you! In this newsletter, you’ll discover new courses, plugins to enhance your learning, tech career tips, and updates for computer science educators.

Master AI With Courses

NEW AI course

Try the new Master AI: Build Game Players Using AlphaZero course. This course gives you the tools and resources to build AI from scratch, emulating DeepMind’s AlphaZero. Work hands-on with GPU-powered cloud environments to create AI game players and design your own web interface.

Try now

DevOps Engineer with AI

Gain a comprehensive understanding of DevOps principles, CI/CD, configuration management, and the integration of AI technologies in DevOps processes. Learn up-to-date practical skills needed for a DevOps engineer role.

Start learning

New in November

See what new content has been added to JetBrains Academy in November, including new Kotlin projects, AI tools, and more.

Explore now

Plugins for Effective Learning

IDE Features Trainer

Discover essential IDE shortcuts and features with the IDE Features Trainer plugin! Learn interactively right inside your IDE – no manuals or video tutorials needed.

Download now

Write flawlessly with Grazie

Spot and correct grammar, spelling, and style issues instantly with the Grazie plugin. Get quick-fixes and explanations for your text – whether in comments, commits, messages, or code.

Install now

Career in Tech

Five soft skills to include in your resume

In an increasingly AI-driven world, soft skills are invaluable! Discover the top five skills to develop for a successful career in tech.

Read now

JetBrains Academy for Course Creators

Teaching IT simplified

Are you an independent course creator or a university professor? We’ve gathered all the useful resources for project-based course creation in one place.

Learn more

Subscribe to JetBrains Academy news
